ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.020: Azores, Sao Miguel, S coast, Ilhéu de Vila Franca; 37°42'N 25°27'W; sandy bottom with stones, depth about 4 m; shore-collecting and snorkeling; 28.ix.1979
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.034: Azores, E of Santa Maria; 36°59'N 25°02'W; depth 47 m, fines sand with shell gravel; van Veen grab; 28.v.1981
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.065: Selvagens archipelago, SW of Selvagem Grande; 30°08'N 15°53'W; depth 100 m, grey fine sand, shell gravel; van Veen grab; 21.x.1978
AV.690916: Italy, prov. Taranto, Gandoli (= 10 km S of Táranto); 16.ix.1969
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.087: Selvagens archipelago, S of Selvagem Pequena; 30°01'N 16°01'W; depth 322 m, white sand, shell gravel and calc. algae; van Veen grab; 22.x.1978
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.044: Canary Islands, S of Lanzarote; 28°48'N 13°46'W; depth 150 m, corals; van Veen grab; 16.v.1980
CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.086: Madeira archipelago, S of Madeira; 32°37'N 16°51'W; depth 360 m, clay; van Veen grab; 15.iii.1976
CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.057: Madeira archipelago, SE of Madeira; 32°43'N 16°43'W; depth 100-122 m, shells and sand; van Veen grab; 12.iii.1976
